zh.title: 比特币/美元技术分析：看涨突破，短期内或继续上涨
zh.content:
比特币当前价格为66060.01美元，24小时上涨2.86%。近期的高点为66300.04美元，低点为64146.1美元，显示出一定的波动性。短期内，市场整体呈现上涨趋势，接近最近的阻力区间。若突破66300美元，可能迎来进一步的上涨。

在技术指标方面，MACD为82.52330，虽信号线缺失，但当前的值表明市场有强烈的上涨动能。RSI无法提供完整数据，但结合其他指标来看，当前价格维持在较高区间，可能接近超买状态。短期内，若未能突破66300美元，价格可能会经历小幅回调。

支撑位方面，SMA(20)为63846.52250，作为短期支撑较为关键。若价格回调至此水平，可能会吸引买盘介入。若跌破该支撑，可能会看到更深的下行风险。

总体来说，建议投资者在突破66300美元时考虑入场，持有至下一波阻力位。若价格回调至63846美元附近，可以观察是否存在反弹机会。在当前市场环境下，投资者需关注价格波动的同时，结合技术指标调整策略。

en.title: Bitcoin vs US Dollar Technical Analysis
en.content:
Bitcoin has recently displayed bullish momentum, trading at $66,060.01 with a 24-hour change of +2.86%. The price action is approaching the recent high of $66,300.04, suggesting a possible breakout. The current trend is leaning towards the upside, supported by higher lows and a solid move from the $64,146.10 low. This could indicate strong market sentiment, as Bitcoin continues to test resistance levels while staying above its 20-period SMA at $63,846.52.

The MACD reading of 82.52 further reinforces the bullish outlook, although the absence of a signal line makes it less reliable for pinpointing an exact reversal or confirmation. This means the momentum is still bullish, but caution is necessary until the signal line appears or the momentum weakens. The RSI is unavailable, making it difficult to assess whether the market is entering overbought conditions. However, price action alone suggests continued bullish strength, with possible upward movement in the short term.

Support remains near $64,146.10, with the next major support level closer to the $63,000 range. If this level holds, Bitcoin could experience further upside potential. A break below this support zone would risk deeper retracement to around the $60,000 mark. Resistance near the $66,300 area is critical. A breakout above this price could trigger more buying interest, opening up targets towards the next psychological level around $70,000.

For traders, a strategy focusing on breakouts above $66,300 could offer a solid entry point. Additionally, close monitoring of the support levels at $64,000 and $63,000 will be essential. If Bitcoin consolidates above these levels, further bullish opportunities may emerge, but any sharp decline below these zones should prompt caution, signaling potential corrections or even trend reversals.
